CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr">
<xsl:output method = "xml" omit-xml-declaration = "no"/>
<!-- Added test comment. --> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:variable name = "prettyUrl" select = "document(concat('cdrutil://pretty-url/', '2af98ad7-51eb-46a4-8c74-111b6215c496'))"/> <TestDoc> <TestElement> <xsl:attribute name = "urlref"> <xsl:value-of select = "$prettyUrl/PrettyUrl"/> </xsl:attribute> </TestElement> </TestDoc> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
